clause_text: In general terms, when you use GenAI output, you will be responsible for it.
Never use any client, third party or personal or non-public Capgemini data, even in anonymized form, in systems that we don't control or have appropriate contractual arrangements with.

Remember that, similar to the use of other tools, usage of GenAI systems is prohibited for activities that are illegal as per applicable laws, fraudulent, unethical, in violation of Capgemini's policies, or that pose a significant risk to Capgemini's reputation.
Ensure all operations comply with local and international regulations.
Personal data must be handled in accordance with privacy laws.
Implement robust security measures to protect company assets.
Adhere to the company's code of ethics in all business dealings.
Identify and mitigate potential risks to the business.
Group Management has decided to limit the usage of GenAI to specific fields at this point in time.
Carefully consider the known risks when building GenAI solutions or when advising customers, and ensure sign-off from your BU / BL management or designated SPoCs and the local legal team.
